name: 3P Development
description:
From complex web and mobile apps to 360 previews and customized VR app solutions, we are here to create a long-lasting partnership and cover the development part for you.
We are Software Development Studio from Skopje, with offices in Amsterdam and New Jersey.  
Our team of iOS/Android Developers have done a good work for many digital/design/dev agencies from NJ, NYC, Vienna, Tel Aviv, Sydney, Brussels and other EU cities. 
In a nutshell, we have 3 models of collaboration: 
1. White label - We are your "on demand team" behind the scenes 
2. Partner - We are pitching an idea together i.e. the name of 3P development is known for the end client 
3. Affiliate - You throw projects towards us and we take it from there. You only collect affiliate commissions. 
READ MORE...
